column3: Not sure why Travis CI failed on this build - I don't know Travis CI that well but it looks like it is unrelated to my change?\n
Agree that the failure looks unrelated.  But yikes, that looks like a somewhat scary error that was stumbled upon, will investigate...\n
@paveljanik @sdaftuar Is there a way to restart this travis build?\n
Lokks like it is already done - all checks have passed.\n

@Christewart Please don't add manually created test cases inside the "automically generated test cases" block, as that block gets overwritten.

Ideally, add this as an automatically generated test here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/v0.12.1/src/test/script_tests.cpp#L353
Sorry for this taking so long, just moving the test case would have been fine, but now that you change script_tests.cpp you need to make sure it doesn't generate the new json every time.\n
@laanwj Should be fixed - I always seem to add unnecessary spaces/new lines without realizing it in my commits :-)\n
Not going to hold this up on a cosmetic nit.\n
Pure cosmetic nit: you have added tab here.\n
Nit^2: I think it's not a tab but four spaces :snail:\n
